titles.title: To designate the building in Orangeburg, South Carolina, which houses the operations of the United States Postal Service as the "J.I. Washington, III, Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 6/11/1998--Introduced. Designates a specified building in Orangeburg, South Carolina, as the J.I. Washington, III, Post Office.
